_comment.description: Test: PR and Linear ticket use completely different words for same feature
_comment.expected: Should find via semantic search and UPDATE
_comment.difficulty: HARD - 'rate limiting' vs 'prevent API abuse' use different vocabulary

LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE.title: Prevent API abuse from heavy users
LINEAR_TICKET_TO_CREATE.description: Some users are hammering our search API causing performance issues for everyone. Need to throttle excessive requests. One user made 10,000 requests in an hour yesterday.

title: Add rate limiting to /api/v1/search endpoint
author: platform-eng
content:
Repository: gathertown/corporate-context
Pull Request: #204 - Add rate limiting to /api/v1/search endpoint
URL: https://github.com/gathertown/corporate-context/pull/204
Status: merged
Author: platform-eng

Description:
Implements token bucket algorithm with 100 req/min per user for the search endpoint.

Changes:
- Added redis-based rate limiter middleware
- Configured 100 requests per minute per API key
- Returns 429 Too Many Requests when limit exceeded
- Added X-RateLimit-* headers to responses
- Dashboard for monitoring rate limit hits

Configuration:
- RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW=60s
- RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100

Activity:

2025-01-23 09:00:00 platform-eng opened pull request
2025-01-23 11:00:00 security-team approved
2025-01-23 11:30:00 platform-eng merged pull request
